titleStmt.title: A briefe treatise against the priesthood & sacrifice of the Church of Rome wherein the simple may perceiue their intollerable impietie, usurping that office and action, which euer appertaine to Christ onely / by G.G.
titleStmt.author: G. G.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Midleton for Tobie Cooke,
